code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={logs:[]};export var robotStore=createSlice({name:"robotStore",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setLogs:function setLogs(state,action){console.log("Logs in store",state.logs,action.payload);state.logs=action.payload;},addSingleLog:function addSingleLog(state,action){state.logs.unshift(action.payload);}}});var _robotStore$actions=robotStore.actions,setLogs=_robotStore$actions.setLogs,addSingleLog=_robotStore$actions.addSingleLog;export{setLogs,addSingleLog};export var logsSelector=function logsSelector(state){return state.robotReducer;};export var robotReducer=robotStore.reducer;
